text:
I have a weird issue. The *JS* `length` function (in `index.jsx` file of mdule )on an array doesn't work when I view the page using proxy but it works on actual HubSpot page. On proxy it says,
```TypeError: cannot read property of undefined (reading length)```
So it means that array or `RepeatedFieldGroup` value in undefined in proxy. Does anyone know what wrong going on?
url/href value should be required for the field, unless the field isn't marked required in which case nothing should be required...
:beetle: I've notice that if a module is marked global, LinkField `.url.href` for `CONTENT` type returns `null`
